    • Method Detail

      • getHomeDirectory

        public static final java.lang.String getHomeDirectory()
        Returns the applications getApplicationDataDir directory. If it is null it uses the value set in TrianaCalcDefaults.

      • savePropertiesFile

        public void savePropertiesFile(java.lang.String path,
                      java.lang.String file,
                      java.lang.String header)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Saves properties to a file.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the file to save
        file - The name of the file to save
        header - A text comment which is used as a header in the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        PropertiesEx.savePropertiesFile(File, String), PropertiesEx.savePropertiesFile(String, String), Properties.save(java.io.OutputStream, java.lang.String)
